text: John Quarre was an Welsh Anglican priest in the 16th century.""The King's Reformation: Henry VIII and the Remaking of the English Church"Bernard, G.W p194: New Haven; Yale University Press; 2005 Langley was educated at Merton College, Oxford.Alumni Oxonienses 1500-1714, Quadring-Quipp He was Archdeacon of Llandaff from 1529 until 1540. ==Notes== Category:16th-century Welsh Anglican priests Category:Archdeacons of Llandaff Category:Alumni of Merton College, Oxford
title: John Quarre
